data.title: Modena Enzo Ferrari Museum entrance ticket
data.meta_description: On a trip to Modena A must-see Ferrari museum Visit the Enzo Ferrari Museum located in Modena, Italy! There are two Enzo Ferrari museums: Maranello and Modena . The Modena Enzo Ferrari Museum has a variety of Ferrari cars on display. You can see everything from prototype Ferraris to racing model Ferrari cars. Learn about the history of Enzo Ferrari at the Ferrari Museum. This is a must-visit attraction for anyone who loves cars. Introduction to major internal exhibitions  The Enzo Ferrari Museum has a variety of exhibitions including: The Life of Enzo Ferrari : This exhibition covers Enzo Ferrari's life from his childhood to his racing career and the founding of the Ferrari automobile company. Ferrari Cars : A variety of Ferrari cars are on display, from early Ferrari models to the latest F1 racing cars. You can see detailed information about each car's design, engine, performance, and more. F1 Racing : This is an exhibition introducing Ferrari’s F1 racing history. You can see Ferrari's winning record, famous drivers, and cars used in racing. Engine Exhibition : Various engines used in Ferrari cars are on display. You can learn about how engines work and the features of Ferrari engines. Design Studio : This is an exhibition showing the Ferrari car design process. You can watch designers sketch and model and learn about the philosophy behind Ferrari car design.
data.text:
Located in Modena, Italy

Enzo Ferrari Museum

The Enzo Ferrari Museum is Ferrari’s official museum located in Modena, Italy. It is operated as a space to commemorate the life and achievements of Enzo Ferrari, an automobile designer and engineer, and is the only place where you can see a variety of Ferrari cars in one place. Opened in 2012, this museum showcases Ferrari's automotive philosophy and passion through various exhibits ranging from Ferrari's early life to F1 racing history.

On a trip to Modena

A must-see Ferrari museum

Visit the Enzo Ferrari Museum located in Modena, Italy! There are two Enzo Ferrari museums: Maranello and Modena . The Modena Enzo Ferrari Museum has a variety of Ferrari cars on display. You can see everything from prototype Ferraris to racing model Ferrari cars. Learn about the history of Enzo Ferrari at the Ferrari Museum. This is a must-visit attraction for anyone who loves cars.

Introduction to major internal exhibitions

The Enzo Ferrari Museum has a variety of exhibitions including:

The Life of Enzo Ferrari : This exhibition covers Enzo Ferrari's life from his childhood to his racing career and the founding of the Ferrari automobile company.

Ferrari Cars : A variety of Ferrari cars are on display, from early Ferrari models to the latest F1 racing cars. You can see detailed information about each car's design, engine, performance, and more.

F1 Racing : This is an exhibition introducing Ferrari’s F1 racing history. You can see Ferrari's winning record, famous drivers, and cars used in racing.

Engine Exhibition : Various engines used in Ferrari cars are on display. You can learn about how engines work and the features of Ferrari engines.

Design Studio : This is an exhibition showing the Ferrari car design process. You can watch designers sketch and model and learn about the philosophy behind Ferrari car design.
